definition: everyone/influential family/great expert
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
girl from a wealthy family/unmarried daughter of a noble house
Three great poets of the Qianlong and Jiaqing era (1735-1820), namely: Yuan Mei 袁枚, Jiang Shiquan 蔣士銓|蒋士铨 and Zhao Yi 趙翼|赵翼
Four Great Yuan Dramatists, namely: Guan Hanqing 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1], Zheng Guangzu 鄭光祖|郑光祖[Zheng4 Guang1 zu3], Ma Zhiyuan 馬致遠|马致远[Ma3 Zhi4 yuan3] and Bai Pu 白樸|白朴[Bai2 Pu3]
the four masters of Yuan poetry, namely 虞集[Yu2 Ji2], 範梈|范梈[Fan4 Peng1], 楊載|杨载[Yang2 Zai4] and 揭傒斯[Jie1 Xi1 si1]
Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties, namely: Cao Buxing 曹不興|曹不兴[Cao2 Bu4 xing1], Gu Kaizhi 顧愷之|顾恺之[Gu4 Kai3 zhi1], Lu Tanwei 陸探微|陆探微[Lu4 Tan4 wei1] and Zhang Sengyou 張僧繇|张僧繇[Zhang1 Seng1 you2]
Four Great Calligraphers of early Tang/refers to Yu Shinan 虞世南[Yu2 Shi4 nan2], Ouyang Xun 歐陽詢|欧阳询[Ou1 yang2 Xun2], Chu Suiliang 褚遂良[Chu3 Sui4 liang2] and Xue Ji 薛稷[Xue1 Ji4]

Eight Giants of Tang and Song prose, esp. involved in the Classics movement 古文運動|古文运动[gu3 wen2 yun4 dong4], namely: Han Yu 韓愈|韩愈[Han2 Yu4], Liu Zongyuan 柳宗元[Liu3 Zong1 yuan2], Ouyang Xiu 歐陽修|欧阳修[Ou1 yang2 Xiu1], the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1], Wang Anshi 王安石[Wang2 An1 shi2], Zeng Gong 曾鞏|曾巩[Zeng1 Gong3]
Four Great Yuan Dramatists, namely: Guan Hanqing 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1], Zheng Guangzu 鄭光祖|郑光祖[Zheng4 Guang1 zu3], Ma Zhiyuan 馬致遠|马致远[Ma3 Zhi4 yuan3] and Bai Pu 白樸|白朴[Bai2 Pu3]

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本課時將近結束，大家可以休息一會兒。

sentences.english: Tears don't mean you're losing, everybody's bruising.
sentences.chinese: 眼淚並不意味着你失去了，大家的青腫。

sentences.english: It's an exquisite book. You can see, it's not thick.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本好書，大家能看到，它一點也不厚。

sentences.english: LECTURER: Hello my name is Paulo D'Iorio.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我是保羅D愛奧利歐。

sentences.english: He always cheats others, thus none of us trust him.
sentences.chinese: 他經常唬人，因此大家都不信任他。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界衛生日，我祝願你們大家身心健康。
大家都不喜歡看到紅色。

sentences.english: If everyone keeps in line, we'll get through the Customs more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 要是大家都守制序，咱們會很快通過海關的。

sentences.english: Bottom line, you bring in revenue for them, you win, they win.
sentences.chinese: 底線就是，你爲他們帶來收入，大家雙贏。

sentences.english: The basic structure of the Ice and Fire books is familiar enough.
sentences.chinese: 《冰與火之歌》的基本脈絡大家一定都很熟悉了。

sentences.english: Hope in the day of aftertime to get along with everyone delectation.
sentences.chinese: 希望在今後的日子裏與大家相處愉快。

sentences.english: He likes cheating people so we usually don't quite trust him.
sentences.chinese: 哄人，所以大家一般不太信任他。

sentences.english: First of all, I sing a song for country songs.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我爲大家唱一首鄉村歌曲。

sentences.english: And welcome to the Curlicue Restaurant, how are you guys doing?
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到花飾餐館，你們大家好嗎？

sentences.english: EG:Another effort entails bringing the entire community into the post-ColdWar era.
sentences.chinese: 大家也在努力使整個智囊團進入加速冷戰時期。

definition: editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
we/us/ourselves/our
everybody/all (guests, colleagues etc)/all of you
you (plural)
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
(onom.) smack!
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
today/at the present/now
to boil noodles
the author/the writer
to be convinced (that sth is true)/to believe/to accept sth as true
people
everybody/everyone/we all
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
therefore/as a result/so/the reason why
presumably/probably/in all likelihood/surely
actually/in fact/really
now/at present/at the moment/modern/current/nowadays
